properties.entry: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT NOTICE_NO ,USER_NO ,NOTICE_TITLE ,COUNT ,CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ? ,NOTICE_CONTENT = ? WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS='Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS='N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, 'previous' AS post_position FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CREATE_DATE < (SELECT CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?) ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
UNION ALL
-- 다음글 SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, 'next' AS post_position FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CREATE_DATE > (SELECT CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?) ORDER BY CREATE_DATE ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
